src_original: vā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu smṛtir evam utpadyate:

tgt_original: 我若不行布施波羅蜜多。

src_original: durgateṣu me kuleṣūpapattir bhaviṣyati,  na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati,  na ca me buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
tgt_original: 當生貧賤家尚無勢力。 何由成就有情嚴淨佛土。

src_original: na ca sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:

tgt_original: 我若不護淨戒波羅蜜多。
乃至況當能得一切智智。
我若不修安忍波羅蜜多。

src_original: indriyāṇi me paribhetsyante,  mukhamaṇḍalaṃ me dhyāmībhaviṣyati,
tgt_original: 當生諸根殘缺容貌醜陋。

src_original: yayā rūpasaṃpadā bodhisattvacārikāṃ me carataḥ. sattvāḥ saha darśanena niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,  na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi,
tgt_original: 若得菩薩圓滿色身行菩薩行。 有情見者必獲無上正等菩提。

src_original: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvajñatāṃ pratilapsye. tasyaivaṃ bhavati:  saced ahaṃ kusīdo bhaviṣyāmi,
tgt_original: 若不得此圓滿色身。 乃至況當能得一切智智。
